trans-unit.source: Provides a customizable activity designer surface for users to visually modify on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma superfície de designer de atividade personalizável para os usuários a serem modificados visualmente em uma superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> allows users to modify how an activity appears on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> permite que os usuários modificar a aparência de uma atividade em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: When you associate <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> with a custom activity class using the `Designer` attribute, the custom activity's appearance is different from other activities when a user drops the custom activity onto a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Quando você associa <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> com uma classe de atividade personalizada usando o `Designer` atributo, aparência da atividade personalizada é diferente de outras atividades quando um usuário remove a atividade personalizada em uma superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Once <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> displays an activity on the design surface, users can draw connectors to other activity designers and resize the designer within the parameters defined by the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> exibe uma atividade na superfície de design, os usuários podem desenhar conectores para outros designers de atividade e redimensione o designer dentro dos parâmetros definidos pela superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Users can only add connectors to the custom activity because the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is associated with the top-level activity in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Os usuários só podem adicionar conectores para a atividade personalizada porque o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> está associado com a atividade de nível superior em um fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que aplicativos de acessibilidade usam para ajustar a interface do usuário do aplicativo para usuários com deficiências.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> associado ao controle.

trans-unit.source: If no `AccessibleObject` is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum `AccessibleObject` atualmente atribuído ao controle, uma nova instância de um é criada.

trans-unit.source: To get or set the `AccessibilityObject` property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Para obter ou definir o `AccessibilityObject` propriedade, você deve adicionar uma referência para o assembly de acessibilidade instalado com o .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] objetos acessíveis, consulte a seção de acessibilidade ativa da biblioteca MSDN.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: O local <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> para começar a desenhar o conector.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: O local <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> para terminar de desenhar o conector.

trans-unit.source: Adds a connector to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um conector ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> that was added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> adicionado ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AddConnector%2A> is called when a user adds a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AddConnector%2A> é chamado quando um usuário adiciona um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the `AddConnnector` method in a custom activity designer's `OnLayoutPosition` method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o `AddConnnector` método em um designer de atividade personalizada `OnLayoutPosition` método.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="target" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> ou <paramref name="target" /> contém uma referência <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner" /> property for <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="target" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner" /> para <paramref name="source" /> ou <paramref name="target" /> contém uma referência <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> is not the container for the connector to add.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> atual não é o contêiner do conector a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> is resized automatically when a user resizes the designer's child designers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> é redimensionado automaticamente quando um usuário redimensiona os designers filho do designer.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> is resized automatically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> é redimensionado automaticamente; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>, o layout do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> é atualizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the margin size to render around the child designers when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho da margem a ser renderizado ao redor dos designers filho quando o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> é redimensionado automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the size of the margin to render around the child designers of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa o tamanho da margem para renderizar uma solução alternativa para os designers do filho do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The default size of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A> is a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> object with dimensions of 40 pixels by 40 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho padrão do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A> é um <xref:System.Drawing.Size> objeto com dimensões de 40 pixels por 40 pixels.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property associated with the current workflow theme is set to `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A> settings are half the height and half the width of the grid size.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> associado com o tema atual do fluxo de trabalho está definida como `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A> configurações são metade da altura e metade da largura do tamanho da grade.

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A>, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A>, o layout do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> é atualizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> settings for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as configurações <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The default setting is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: A configuração padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly" />.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> allows the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to grow as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> permite que o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> cresça conforme o necessário para ajustar seu conteúdo, mas não menor que o valor de reduzir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>, o layout do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> é atualizado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to bring to the top of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> a ser trazido para frente da ordem Z.

trans-unit.source: Brings the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to the top of the z-order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Traz o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> especificado para a frente da ordem Z do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A> modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as its top visible child designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A> modifica a ordem z para a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> exibir especificado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> como seu designer filho visível superior.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a designer at the top of the z-order when a user selects it.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse método para exibir um designer de na parte superior da ordem z, quando um usuário o seleciona.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner` deve ser um filho do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> antes de chamar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Se não estiver, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A> lança um <xref:System.ArgumentException>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contém uma referência <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> is not found in the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> não for encontrado na coleção <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> to check on the source activity designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> a ser verificado no designer de atividade de origem.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> to check on the target activity designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> a ser verificado no designer de atividade de destino.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can create a connection between the specified connection point on a source child activity designer and the specified connection point on a target child activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> pode criar uma conexão entre o ponto de conexão especificado em um designer de atividade filho de origem e o ponto de conexão especificado em um designer de atividade filho de destino.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can draw a connector between source and target activity designers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> puder desenhar um conector entre os designers de atividade de origem e de destino; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can be collapsed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> pode ser recolhido em uma superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can be collapsed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> pode ser recolhida; caso contrário <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> sempre retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to check.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> a ser verificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a user can visually resize the specified child activity designer in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se um usuário pode redimensionar visualmente o designer de atividade filho especificado no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a user can visually resize the specified activity designer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se um usuário puder redimensionar visualmente o designer de atividade especificado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.CanResizeContainedDesigner%2A> returns `true` if `containedDesigner` is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe derivada, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.CanResizeContainedDesigner%2A> retorna `true` se `containedDesigner` é um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Other types of designers cannot be resized.
trans-unit.target: Outros tipos de designers não podem ser redimensionados.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> is added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> é adicionado ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A> é o manipulador de eventos delegado registrado para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded> evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user changes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> locations associated with a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um usuário altera os locais <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> associados a um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> exibido pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
trans-unit.target: Um conector é alterado quando um usuário altera a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locais em ambas as extremidades de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A> é o manipulador de eventos delegado registrado para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user removes a connector from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um usuário remove um conector do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> é o manipulador de eventos delegado registrado para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of connectors that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de conectores somente leitura associados ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection that contains all <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção somente leitura que contém todos os <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> objetos associados a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A connector is the line that appears on a workflow design surface that connects one activity designer to another.
trans-unit.target: Um conector é a linha que aparece em uma superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho que se conecta a um designer de atividade para outra.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: O local <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> para começar a desenhar o conector.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: O local <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> para terminar de desenhar o conector.

trans-unit.source: Creates a connector between the two specified connection points.
trans-unit.target: Cria um conector entre os dois pontos de conexão especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> that was created.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> criado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer is being disposed; <see langword="false" /> if the designer is being finalized.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o designer estiver sendo descartado; <see langword="false" /> se o designer estiver sendo finalizado.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os usuários podem arrastar e desenhar conectores na superfície de designer de atividade de forma livre.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se os usuários podem arrastar e desenhar conectores na superfície do designer de atividade de forma livre; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can be visually resized on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> pode ser redimensionado visualmente na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can be visually resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> pode ser visualmente redimensionados; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.EnableVisualResizing%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> é definido como `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.EnableVisualResizing%2A> retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: In all other conditions <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.EnableVisualResizing%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Em todas as outras condições <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.EnableVisualResizing%2A> retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> returns the first child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection, or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the collection count is zero.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> Retorna o primeiro designer filho no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> coleção, ou um `null` referência (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) se a contagem da coleção é zero.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Object" /> in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> atual na ordem de navegação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> que determina a ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o primeiro objeto selecionável que segue o objeto especificado na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that follows the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Object" /> selecionável que segue o parâmetro <paramref name="obj" /> na ordem de navegação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of glyphs that are displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de glifos exibidos no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> that contains the glyphs displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> que contém os glifos exibidos no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Glyphs%2A> returns a glyph for each connectable child designer found on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Glyphs%2A> Retorna um glifo para cada designer filho conectável encontrado na <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that contains the coordinates on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que contém as coordenadas na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho da qual coletar informações.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the <see langword="FreeformActivityDesigner" /> at the specified coordinates on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações sobre o <see langword="FreeformActivityDesigner" /> nas coordenadas especificadas na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that contains information about the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> at the specified coordinates
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> que contém informações sobre o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> nas coordenadas especificadas

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> checks whether the location has occurred on a connector or one of the child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> verifica se o local ocorreu em um conector ou um dos designers de atividade filho.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> occurs on a child activity that is being dragged to another location, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> returns information about the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, not the designer being moved.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> ocorre em uma atividade filho que está sendo arrastada para outro local, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> retorna informações sobre o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, não o designer está sendo movido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> with which to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> com o qual inicializar o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> usando o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: `Initialize` adds a designer property extender to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> for it to use until the design surface is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: `Initialize` Adiciona um extensor de propriedade do designer para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> para ele usar até a superfície de design é destruída.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that specifies the location to add the activities.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> que especifica o local para adicionar as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> read-only collection that contains the activities to add to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção somente leitura <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que contém as atividades a serem adicionadas ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified read-only collection of activities to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a coleção somente leitura especificada de atividades ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> no local especificado na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que é o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns the last child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> property or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> does not contain any child designers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> Retorna o último designer filho no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> propriedade ou um `null` referência (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> não contém qualquer designers filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o local do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Point" /> that represents the location of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="Point" /> que representa o local do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Location%2A> is set due to a user resizing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, the designer maintains the relative positions of its child designers.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Location%2A> é definida devido a um usuário redimensionar a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, o designer mantém as posições relativas de designers de seu filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size settings for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as configurações de tamanho mínimo para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the smallest possible size for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa o menor tamanho possível para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Location to move activities to.
trans-unit.target: O local para o qual mover atividades.

trans-unit.source: Collection that contains the activities to move to <c>moveLocation.</c>
trans-unit.target: Coleção que contém as atividades a serem movidas para <c>moveLocation.</c>

trans-unit.source: Moves activities to a specified location within the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Move as atividades para um local especificado dentro da superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to move.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> a ser movido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the designer's new location.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que representa o novo local do designer.

trans-unit.source: Moves the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Move o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> especificado para o local especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A> sets new bounds for the moved designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A> Define os novos limites para o designer movido e executa todas as operações de layout necessário para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner` deve ser um filho do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> antes de chamar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Se não estiver, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A> lança um <xref:System.ArgumentException>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contém uma referência <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> is not found in the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> não for encontrado na coleção <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
trans-unit.target: Um conector é alterado quando um usuário altera a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locais em ambas as extremidades de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains information about the added or removed activities.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre as atividades adicionadas ou removidas.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a child activity is added or deleted from its <see langword="Activities" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> quando uma atividade filho é adicionada ou excluída de sua coleção <see langword="Activities" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: O local <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> para começar a desenhar o conector.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: O local <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> para terminar de desenhar o conector.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a connection has been established between two of its contained activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> quando uma conexão foi estabelecida entre dois dos seus designers de atividade contidos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnContainedDesignersConnected%2A> is called when a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> is drawn between the source on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> object's contained activity designers to target on a second contained activity designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnContainedDesignersConnected%2A> chamado quando um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> é desenhada entre a origem em um do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> objeto do contido designers de atividade de destino em um designer de atividade contida segundo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> que define os argumentos de evento de operação.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is completed within the bounds of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> quando uma operação do tipo "arrastar e soltar" é concluída dentro dos limites de sua superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> que define os argumentos de evento de operação.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> quando uma operação de arrastar-soltar está em andamento e o cursor do mouse do usuário está dentro dos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed when the designer has the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma tecla é pressionada quando o designer tem o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que define os argumentos de evento de operação.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de layout para posicionar indicações visuais e designers filho no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que define os argumentos de evento de operação.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when the size of the visual cues on the designers displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> have changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> quando o tamanho das indicações visuais sobre os designers exibidos pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the new size of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa o novo tamanho do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> na área de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> returns the size of the current bounding rectangle for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> when <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> Retorna o tamanho do retângulo delimitador atual para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> quando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> é definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> calculates and returns new size settings for the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> é definido como `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> calcula e retorna as novas configurações de tamanho para o retângulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to true and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> returns <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> é definido como true e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> não está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> retorna <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs" /> que define os argumentos de evento de operação.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a user is visually resizing it at design time.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> quando um usuário está visualmente redimensionando-o no tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnResizing%2A> performs all resizing tasks on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> é definido como `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnResizing%2A> executa todas as tarefas de redimensionamento na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnResizing%2A> performs layout tasks, but no resizing tasks.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> é definido como `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnResizing%2A> executa tarefas de layout, mas nenhuma tarefa de redimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`, all contained designers retain their previous locations on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> é definido como `false`, independente de todos os designers de mantém seus locais anteriores no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> that contains the updated theme property settings.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> que contém as configurações de propriedade do tema atualizado.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> that its associated theme has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> que o tema associado foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnThemeChange%2A> always sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A> property to an empty string and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> property to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe derivada, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnThemeChange%2A> sempre define o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A> propriedade como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia e o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> propriedade `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A> is set to `true`, the locations of each child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is snapped to the nearest grid line.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A> é definido como `true`, os locais de cada designer filho no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> é ajustado para a linha de grade mais próxima.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> especificado do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.RemoveConnector%2A> deletes the specified connector from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A> collection and calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.RemoveConnector%2A> Exclui o conector especificado do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A> coleta e chama o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="connector" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="connector" /> contém uma referência <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to resize.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> a ser redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the new dimensions of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa as novas dimensões do designer.

trans-unit.source: Resizes the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to the dimensions of specified size.
trans-unit.target: Redimensiona o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> especificado para as dimensões do tamanho especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A> sets new bounds for the resized designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A> Define os novos limites para o designer redimensionado e executa todas as operações de layout necessário para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner` deve ser um filho do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> antes de chamar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Se não estiver, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A> lança um <xref:System.ArgumentException>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contém uma referência <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> is not found in the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> não for encontrado na coleção <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to set to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> a ser definido como parte de trás da ordem z.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to the bottom of the z-order of the <see langword="FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Define o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> especificado como a parte de trás da ordem Z do <see langword="FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A> modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as the bottom visible designer on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A> modifica a ordem z para a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> exibir especificado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> como o designer de inferior visível na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a designer at the bottom of the z-order when a user deselects it.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse método para exibir um designer de na parte inferior da ordem z, quando um usuário a desmarque.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner` deve ser um filho do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> antes de chamar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Se não estiver, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A> lança um <xref:System.ArgumentException>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contém uma referência <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> is not found in the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> não for encontrado na coleção <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> desenha conectores no primeiro plano da sua superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> desenha conectores em primeiro plano do seu design de superfície; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a class that derives from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ShowConnectorsInForeground%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe que deriva de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ShowConnectorsInForeground%2A> sempre retorna `false`.
